TranscendenceAdventure.name: Domina & Oracus I: The Stars of the Pilgrim

Language.Text:
(cat "{/rtf Called by Domina to journey to the Galactic Core, you leave the safe environs " "of your home system and explore the farthest reaches of Human Space./n/n"
"But dangers stalk your passage and even Domina's protection is no guarantee, for none " "who have been called have yet returned./n/n"
"Will your pilgrimage be more successful?}" )

Events.OnGameStart: (block Nil (gamSetCrawlImage &rsProlog1;) (gamSetCrawlSoundtrack &muDominaMainTheme;) (gamSetCrawlText (cat "When the dream came, you knew Domina had chosen you. " "You would sacrifice everything for the chance She offered: " "to join Her at the Galactic Core, the eternal temple of the gods.\n\n" "Leaving your former life behind, you begin the long journey. " "No matter what obstacles lie in your path " "you will not fail Domina. You will reach the Galactic Core." )) )
Events.OnGlobalUniverseCreated:
(block (theMission)
; Give the "Reach the Galactic Core" mission to the player
(setq theMission (msnCreate &msReachGalacticCore; Nil)) (if theMission (msnAccept theMission) ) )
